io.janusproject.services.network

Interface EventSerializer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEventSerializer, GsonEventSerializer, JavaBinaryEventSerializer

    public interface EventSerializer
    A serializer of events to be published over the network.

    A serializer convert an EventDispatch into/from an EventEnvelope.

    The implementation of a serializer may use an EventEncrypter for encrypting/decrypting the envelope.

    Version:
    2.0.2.0 2015-04-09 09:04:05
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez
    See Also:
    EventDispatch, EventEnvelope
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel
